analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/14/0x8842511f9eaaa75904017ff8ca26ba03ee2ddfa0.sol:
	Contract createTreasure has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/14/0x8842511f9eaaa75904017ff8ca26ba03ee2ddfa0.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
